snippet.title: inFAMOUS: Second Son - Special Edition Trailer (PS4) [1080p] TRUE-HD QUALITY
snippet.description:
►► Remember to select 720p or 1080p HD◄◄
Grab your special edition copy of inFAMOUS: Second Son to get very own Delsin Rowe beanie hat to wear and a bonus mission. Play Cole's Legacy to discover the mind-blowing events leading up to Delsin's story and unlock an exclusive in-game jacket inspired by the legendary Cole MacGrath.
Platforms: Playstation 4 Exclusive
Publisher: Sony Computer Entertainment
Developer: Sucker Punch
Genre:  Third-Person Action
Release Date:
US: March 21, 2014
EU: March 21, 2014
